imr.matrix

Class GaussianSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • imr.matrix.GaussianSolver

  • public final class GaussianSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    The GaussianSolver class defines static methods to solve linear systems using the Gaussian elimination method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Vector solve(Matrix m)
      Static method to solve a linear system with a mxn matrix passed as parameter where n = m+1.
      static Vector solve(Matrix m, Vector v)
      static method to solve a linear system passing a nxn coeficient matrix and a n coeficient vector as parameter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public static Vector solve(Matrix m)
        Static method to solve a linear system with a mxn matrix passed as parameter where n = m+1.
        Parameters:
        m - a mxn system matrix.
        Returns:
        a vector with the solution of the system. The matrix passed as parameter is the nxn coeficient matrix and the last column has the coeficient vector. So it is a mxn matrix where n = m+1.

        If the system cannot be solved, this method returns null.

      • solve

        public static Vector solve(Matrix m,
                           Vector v)
        static method to solve a linear system passing a nxn coeficient matrix and a n coeficient vector as parameter.
        Parameters:
        m - a nxn coeficient matrix.
        v - a n coeficient vector.
        Returns:
        a vector with the solution of the system. If the system cannot be solved, this method returns null.
